text: hi my name is Scotty wah I'm the
director of Need for Speed this is the
scene where Aaron Paul and Imogen Poots
are being chased by the Detroit Police
then that are being it's an homage to
the video gave me for speed we really
wanted to put the audience in the actual
driver's seat and so we had one of our
stunt double Sam human who's the drift
champion of the world right now perform
a double 360 at 80 miles an hour so you
were able to as an audience member
actually get to do it in the movie and
it was really it was really fun because
Sam such a talented driver and then
afterwards we needed the character to
escape the cops in a way that they would
never be able to catch up so he had to
perform a grasshopper which was a
hundred and seventy five foot jump over
four lanes of traffic and he would need
to have to hit the ramp at 71 miles an
hour which was about a 40 foot tall ramp
and at the apex of his jump he would be
twenty two feet up in the air we were
lucky enough to found a natural down
slope of grass where he would land so it
was realistic and I knew I only had one
take and Troy Gilbert the stunt double
landed it perfectly and thank God
because we didn't want to do it again
